coverage_details.accommodation: Standard Suite, with single/private room at IMC and Dr. Suleiman Habib centers
coverage_details.optical_frame: SR 400.00 as part of the optical limit
coverage_details.bone_marrow_transplant: Up to 3 cases per policy, subject to approval
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Heart, liver and kidney only, covered up to annual limit
coverage_details.dental_general: Consultation, simple & surgical extractions, antibiotics, root canal, fillings, X-rays (small and panoramic during policy period), medication, dental scaling, pulpotomy (up to benefit sub-limit)
coverage_details.congenital: Covered up to Annual Limit; for all beneficiaries subject to policy aggregate limit SR 150,000
coverage_details.optical: SR 500.00 (age limit 0-999); age sub-limit waived per special instruction
coverage_details.disability_cases: SR 100,000.00; covered up to benefit sub-limit per CCHI
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for outpatient & inpatient services (except those with explicit limits); Pre-auth for medication: SR 1,000,000.00.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Developmental cases covered. Allergy and psoriasis treatment covered. Diabetes insulin pump covered for children under 8 or adults over 60 with Alzheimer’s. Parents/collaterals covered, up to 200, in policy period. Post IVF treatment: up to 5 cases/policy. Knee replacement after trauma covered. Road Traffic Accident injuries covered. Newborns covered from birth. Congenital defects for newborns covered up to policy max. Benefit for in-house clinics medicines up to SR 500,000. If needed care not available in-network, Bupa will arrange alternative. Treatment requiring hospital isolation covered.

coverage_details.optical_frame: SR 400.00 as part of the optical limit

coverage_details.optical: SR 500.00 (age limit 0-999); age sub-limit waived per special instruction
coverage_details.disability_cases: SR 100,000.00; covered up to benefit sub-limit per CCHI
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Pre-Authorization for VIP is SR 2,000. No pre-approval required for outpatient/inpatient services, except for dentistry, optical, hearing aids, dialysis and maternity. Medication pre-auth limit: SR 2,000.00.

If needed care not available in-network, Bupa will arrange alternative. Treatment requiring hospital isolation covered.
